name: Arrow Spray
desc: Fire 16 arrows in a 60 degree arc. Each arrow deals 40% damage.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Arrow Storm
desc: 16 arrows fall from the sky in the target area, each dealing 40% damage.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Assassinate
desc: Attacking your target with meticulous aim, dealing 135% damage in one shot. When performed from stealth, this attack gains a 50% damage increase.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Ballistic Shot
desc: A shot that deals 100% damage and receives 5% bonus damage per 1m distance to target.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Barrage
desc: Fire three arrows at three targets of your choice, each dealing 60% damage.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Elemental Arrowheads
desc: Target a surface in melee radius. For one turn, elemental damage matching that surface is added to your ranged weapon attacks and ranged weapon-based skills.

name: Farsight
desc: Increase the range of a targeted character's ranged attacks and skills by 4m.

name: First Aid
desc: Heals target for [X] Vitality. Cures Crippled, Atrophy, Knocked Down, Blind, Silenced, Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, and Diseased.
special: Restore [X] Vitality. Set Rested for 1 turn(s).

name: Glitter Dust
desc: Target is marked, reducing its ability to dodge. Prevents target from going invisible.

name: Marksman's Fang
desc: Shoot an arrow that goes straight through enemies. Each enemy that's hit takes 100% damage, ignoring armour.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Pin Down
desc: Deals 120% damage and Cripples target character.
special: Set Crippled for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Reactive Shot
desc: Target a circular area. Until your next turn, you will reflexively shoot at the first three enemies moving within this area.

name: Ricochet
desc: Fire a normal arrow that deals 90% damage and then finds another target within 5m. Forks up to 2 times.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Sky Shot
desc: Leap into the air before shooting, gaining damage bonuses for your superior height. Deals 100% Damage.
special: This skill receives high ground bonuses regardless of elevation. Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Tactical Retreat
desc: Apply haste to yourself, then teleport away from imminent danger.
